column1: #Text=To prepare polycrystalline samples of both LaFeO3 and GdFeO3, mixtures of KCl (99.0%)
#Text=and NaCl (99.5%) Sigma-Aldrich, were first grounded separately and then together until a
#Text=The same procedure was employed with a stoichiometric mixture
#Text=of Fe2O3 (99.0 %), and La2O3 or Gd2O3, respectively; finally, a grounded 1:10 molar reactants
#Text=to salt proportion mixture was 6 hours heat treated at 900 째C.
#Text=eutectic salt mixture is 650 째C [18, 19] so its purpose is to serve as a liquid medium to
#Text=improve the mobility of the reactants to favor their reaction times.
